article_title: Ain't No Government Big (Or Small) Enough?

article_metadata.description: Partisan differences on government’s size and scope are greater than in the past and are already proving to be defining issues in the 2016 election.
article_metadata.author: Karlyn Bowman

og.description: Partisan differences on government’s size and scope are greater than in the past and are already proving to be defining issues in the 2016 election.
